name: It's All Mine
description:
It's All Mine is an arcade top-down shooter where you play as an OTIS (Orbital Terrain Infiltration System) and soar through space collecting precious metals.

Fuel conservation is key, use gravity and collect carbon/iridium to refuel; run out of fuel and be lost in the dark void of space.

Your drill takes fuel as well, if you want to take on the larger asteroids you have to collect enough iridium to upgrade your drill.

A game by Patricio and Jordan! (exclamation point, yes)
